scripts.lint: npm run prettier && npm run build && export NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192' && npx nx affected --target=lint:eslint --parallel=${NX_PARALLEL:-3} && npm run lint:configs && npm run lint:versions
scripts.cilint: npm run cprettier && export NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192' && npx nx affected --target=lint:eslint --parallel=${NX_PARALLEL:-3} && npm run lint:configs && npm run lint:versions
scripts.build: npm run lint:configs && npx nx run-many --parallel=${NX_PARALLEL:-3} -t build
scripts.test: npm run lint:configs && npx nx run-many --parallel=${NX_PARALLEL:-3} -t test
scripts.clear:local: npm set registry && ps aux | grep '[v]erdaccio' | awk '{print $2}' | xargs -r kill -9
scripts.release:local: npm run build && npm run clear:local && npx ts-node ./tools/scripts/publish-local.ts
scripts.release:lib: ./wipe.sh && sh ./tools/scripts/bump-version.sh && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test && read -p 'Enter OTP: ' otp && export NPM_CONFIG_OTP=$otp && npx nx release publish -g paima-sdk && npx nx release publish -g node-sdk
